mapper.insert: insert into place( place_id, place_depth1, place_depth2, place_depth3 ) values( #{placeId}, #{placeDepth1}, #{placeDepth2}, #{placeDepth3} )
mapper.select: select distinct place_depth1 from place order BY place_depth1 ASC
select distinct place_depth2 from place where place_depth1 = #{value} order by place_depth2 ASC

select place.place_id as placeId, place.place_depth1 as placeDepth1, place.place_depth2 as placeDepth2, place.place_depth3 as placeDepth3 from place join restaurant on restaurant.restaurant_place = place.place_id where restaurant.restaurant_id = #{restaurantId}
select min(place_id) as placeId, place_depth1 as placeDepth1 from place group by place_depth1 order by place_depth1 asc

select place.place_id as placeId, place.place_depth1 as placeDepth1, place_image.attachment_no as attachmentNo from place left join place_image on place.place_id = place_image.place_id where place.place_id in ( select min(place_id) from place group by place_depth1 ) order by place.place_depth1 asc
